attributes.action: put a stop to women commentating on match of the day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: yes equal opportunities in some areas of life is a good thing, however the fact that a woman was commentating on match of the day was a disgrace, she was pathetic and clearly has got the job because she is a woman and equal opportunities has gone mad, this has to stop before even crazier stuff occurs next people who cant do simple maths will become maths teachers because of equal opportunities. the goverment has to put an end to this farce, and make sure equal opportunities does not ruin our society

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
